page.title: 18BIRDS IN HORTON
page.content: In my garage there is a robin's nest.The nest had six eggs.Five eggs hatched out of six.When the chicks first hatched they had no feathers but they had a few on the top of their heads.As they got bigger the feathers covered their bodies.One morning we went to look at them and they were gone.In our barn we have a blackbird's nest but we cannot see the little ones because it is so high up.In our chimney we have a crow's nest and a swallow's nest is in the roof. Kelly All sorts of birds come into my garden and perch on the bird table.I think that the blackbird,rooks and starlings are greedy and take all the food.They drive the little birds off so that they don't have a chance. Once when I was putting some seeds in the garden a bird came and hopped on to the tray where I was working. Sarah
